scene.mainElements: Defeated knight returning home as ordinary man, loyal squire now acting as caretaker, familiar landscape of La Mancha, windmills just windmills now, journey ending where it began, no text or letters visible
scene.details: Wooden cage cart following behind with salvaged armor pieces, donkey plodding along faithfully, dust motes in golden light, familiar stone walls and olive groves, shepherds driving flocks home, church bells ringing vespers in distance, worn path showing way home, no text or letters visible
scene.background: La Mancha plains stretching endlessly, village rooftops becoming visible, windmills turning peacefully on hills
scene.atmosphere: Melancholy homecoming, dreams given up but dignity retained, friendship proven through trials, ordinary world reclaiming extraordinary man, sunset on age of personal chivalry, quiet end to grand adventure, no text or letters visible
